original_title: Julio César Chávez Jr. deported to Mexico for alleged cartel ties and drug trafficking | CNN
article_summary: Boxer Julio César Chávez Jr. has been deported to Mexico following his arrest in the U.S. for overstaying his visa and lying on a green card application. He is wanted in Mexico for alleged arms and drug trafficking and ties to the Sinaloa Cartel. The investigation into Chávez started in 2019.</s>
